description: Gets a list of PipeLineExecutionStep objects.

nested_items.name: PipelineExecutionSteps
nested_items.description: A list of PipeLineExecutionStep objects. Each PipeLineExecutionStep consists of StepName, StartTime, EndTime, StepStatus, and Metadata. Metadata is an object with properties for each job that contains relevant information about the job created by the step.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of the step that is executed.

nested_items.name: StepDisplayName
nested_items.description: The display name of the step.

nested_items.name: StepDescription
nested_items.description: The description of the step.

nested_items.name: StartTime
nested_items.description: The time that the step started executing.

nested_items.name: EndTime
nested_items.description: The time that the step stopped executing.

nested_items.name: StepStatus
nested_items.description: The status of the step execution.

nested_items.name: CacheHitResult
nested_items.description: If this pipeline execution step was cached, details on the cache hit.

nested_items.name: SourcePipelineExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the pipeline execution.

nested_items.name: FailureReason
nested_items.description: The reason why the step failed execution. This is only returned if the step failed its execution.

nested_items.name: TrainingJob
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the training job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the training job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: ProcessingJob
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the processing job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the processing job.

nested_items.name: TransformJob
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the transform job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the transform job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: TuningJob
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the tuning job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the tuning job that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the created model.

nested_items.name: RegisterModel
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model package that the model was registered to by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the model package.

nested_items.name: Condition
nested_items.description: The outcome of the condition evaluation that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: Outcome
nested_items.description: The outcome of the Condition step evaluation.

nested_items.name: CallbackToken
nested_items.description: The pipeline generated token from the Amazon SQS queue.

nested_items.name: SqsQueueUrl
nested_items.description: The URL of the Amazon Simple Queue Service (Amazon SQS) queue used by the callback step.

nested_items.name: OutputParameters
nested_items.description: A list of the output parameters of the callback step.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the output parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the output parameter.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the Lambda function that was run by this step execution.

nested_items.name: OutputParameters
nested_items.description: A list of the output parameters of the Lambda step.

nested_items.name: Name
nested_items.description: The name of the output parameter.

nested_items.name: Value
nested_items.description: The value of the output parameter.

nested_items.name: ClusterId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the EMR cluster.

nested_items.name: StepId
nested_items.description: The identifier of the EMR cluster step.

nested_items.name: StepName
nested_items.description: The name of the EMR cluster step.

nested_items.name: LogFilePath
nested_items.description: The path to the log file where the cluster step's failure root cause is recorded.

nested_items.name: QualityCheck
nested_items.description: The configurations and outcomes of the check step execution. This includes:
The type of the check conducted.
The Amazon S3 URIs of baseline constraints and statistics files to be used for the drift check.
The Amazon S3 URIs of newly calculated baseline constraints and statistics.
The model package group name provided.
The Amazon S3 URI of the violation report if violations detected.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of check processing job initiated by the step execution.
The Boolean flags indicating if the drift check is skipped.
If step property BaselineUsedForDriftCheck is set the same as CalculatedBaseline.

nested_items.name: ClarifyCheck
nested_items.description: Container for the metadata for a Clarify check step. The configurations and outcomes of the check step execution. This includes:
The type of the check conducted,
The Amazon S3 URIs of baseline constraints and statistics files to be used for the drift check.
The Amazon S3 URIs of newly calculated baseline constraints and statistics.
The model package group name provided.
The Amazon S3 URI of the violation report if violations detected.
The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of check processing job initiated by the step execution.
The boolean flags indicating if the drift check is skipped.
If step property BaselineUsedForDriftCheck is set the same as CalculatedBaseline.

nested_items.name: ErrorMessage
nested_items.description: A message that you define and then is processed and rendered by the Fail step when the error occurs.

nested_items.name: AutoMLJob
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AutoML job that was run by this step.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the AutoML job.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint in the step.

nested_items.name: EndpointConfig
nested_items.description: The endpoint configuration used to create an endpoint during this step execution.

nested_items.name: Arn
nested_items.description: The Amazon Resource Name (ARN) of the endpoint configuration used in the step.

nested_items.name: AttemptCount
nested_items.description: The current attempt of the execution step. For more information, see Retry Policy for SageMaker Pipelines steps.

nested_items.name: SelectiveExecutionResult
nested_items.description: The ARN from an execution of the current pipeline from which results are reused for this step.

nested_items.name: SourcePipelineExecutionArn
nested_items.description: The ARN from an execution of the current pipeline.

nested_items.name: NextToken
nested_items.description: If the result of the previous ListPipelineExecutionSteps request was truncated, the response includes a NextToken. To retrieve the next set of pipeline execution steps, use the token in the next request.
